item.description:
Guided by Tantric Master Educator Tj Bartel, this workshop will explore intimate connection and the ancient Tantric healing practices that support us in connecting to ourselves and others -- not only during love making but throughout the everyday moments of life.  

 

During this workshop, we will practice powerful guided meditations for grounding, explore the power of boundaries and learn more about the subtle edges of our energy fields and its impact on relationships. 

 

We will become conscious of where and how we touch others. learn six types of touch, including energy transmission.  Conscious communication, clearing techniques, sex magic and manifestation are other topics that Tj will present (and we will experience.) 

 

The workshop will culminate in a sweet, non-sexual, clothing-on Puja ceremony that will leave you feeling deeply connected and blissful!  

 

All of these practices can easily be integrated into our daily lives and will help us expand our capacity to love and be loved -- individually and in community.  

 

No partner needed; all levels of experience welcome; singles and couples. 

 

The workshop will be held from 10-5:30 pm with an hour break for lunch. 

Come with a friend and the price drops to $99. 

 

Please feel free to email or call me with questions.
item.name: Day-long Tantra Workshop with Tj Bartel (Boston)
